page.title: 09Farming - continued
page.content:
Ion Farm-Gravenhurst
grown) and a high protein feed, which when mixed gives a balanced ration. All the feeding is mechanised and the unit is run by one person.the total labour force of the farm is 7, of these one man has to relieve the beef and dairy when they have their days of. At harvest time 2 or 3 exrra are employed to help. Most of the employees live in houses belonging to the farm, so that they can be near to the stock. These cottages were built at about the same time as the farm itself, only 2 houses have been added this century. The farm is highly mechanised, we 2 combines, l4 tractors, a self-propelled sprayer and a grain drier for both the corn and oilseed rape.
